articles.title: South Africa's Johannesburg Hit By Powerful Earthquake - NDTV
articles.description: A 5.0-magnitude earthquake on Sunday struck near Johannesburg, shaking buildings across South Africa's most populous province, the Unites States Geological Survey reported.
articles.content:
Buildings shook across the province of Gauteng.
